tool_description: Segments continuous audio into optimal chunks for transcription processing, considering speech boundaries and computational efficiency.

respect_speech_boundaries.description: Whether to avoid cutting speech in the middle

error_messages: Invalid audio chunk: Provide a valid audio_chunk_id.
Invalid target segment duration: target_segment_ms must be between 200-5000 milliseconds.
Invalid maximum segment duration: max_segment_ms must be between 1000-10000 milliseconds and greater than target_segment_ms.
Invalid minimum segment duration: min_segment_ms must be between 100-1000 milliseconds and less than target_segment_ms.
Segmentation failed: Unable to segment audio chunk according to specified parameters.
usage: Provide audio_chunk_id for segmentation. Configure timing parameters and boundary respect settings. Returns optimally segmented audio chunks ready for transcription.

boundaries_respected.description: Whether speech boundaries were successfully preserved
